methods.name: types
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Results#types
methods.description: Indicates the field names and types for the rows in the returned data.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

db = spanner.client "my-instance", "my-database"

results = db.execute "SELECT * FROM users"

results.types.each do |name, type|
  puts "Column #{name} is type {type}"
end

returns.description: The types of the returned data.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

db = spanner.client "my-instance", "my-database"

results = db.execute "SELECT * FROM users"

results.rows.each do |row|
  puts "User #{row[:id]} is #{row[:name]}""
end

params.name: yield.rows
params.description:
the hash that contains the result names and
values.

methods.name: streaming?
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Results#streaming?
methods.description: Whether the returned data is streaming from the Spanner API.
